com.eco.bio7.discrete

Class LandscapeMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.discrete.LandscapeMetrics

  • public class LandscapeMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a few common landscape metrics for the use in spatially explicit simulations. These metrics are a java subset implementation of the Fragstat algorithms.
    Author:
    Bio7

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LandscapeMetrics()

      Returns the amount of edges from type n to type n with the neighbourhood rule.

      Returns the fractal dimension of each patch j of type i (pij).

      Returns the patch density of type (state) n.

      Returns the perimeter of all patches of type n.

      • getTotalAmount

        public int getTotalAmount(int type)
        Returns the total amount of individual cells of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - state (type) to be counted.
        Returns:
        the amount as an integer value.

      • getTotalArea

        public int getTotalArea()
        Returns the total area of the field(number of cells).
        Returns:
        the area as an integer value.

        Returns:

      • getPatchesSize

        public int[] getPatchesSize(int type)
        Returns the sizes of each patch j of type i (pij) available in the discrete grid.
        Parameters:
        type - the type(state).
        Returns:
        an integer array with the patch size.

        Returns:

      • getFractalDimension

        public double[] getFractalDimension(int type)
        Returns the fractal dimension of each patch j of type i (pij).
        Parameters:
        type - the type(state).
        Returns:
        a double array with the fractal dimensions.

      • getPatchesDistance

        public double[] getPatchesDistance(int type)
        Returns the distances to the nearest neighbour of each patch. It uses a very slow algorithm and shouldn't be used in a random field >300*300 ! The function will return an array of size 1 with value 0 if the field consists only of one patch of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type(state).
        Returns:
        a double array with the distances.

      • getPatchesPerimeter

        public double[] getPatchesPerimeter(int type)
        Returns the perimeter of all patches of type n.
        Parameters:
        type - the type(state).
        Returns:
        a double array with the perimeters.

      • getEdge

        public double[] getEdge(int type,
               int toType,
               int n)
        Returns the amount of edges from type n to type n with the neighbourhood rule.
        Parameters:
        type - the type(state).
        toType - the type(state).
        n - an integer value for the neighbourhood rule.
        Returns:
        a double array with the amounts.

      • doPatchStatistics

        public void doPatchStatistics(int neighbourhood)
        This is the main method to calculate Landscape Metrics. This method expects the rule of neighbourhood (4,8,12).
        Parameters:
        neighbourhood - an integer value for the neighbourhood rule.
